extensionAttribute.description: This attribute verifies whether or not the "Auto Fill Miscellaneous Forms" Safari setting is enabled. The value to be verified will need to be specified when creating this extension attribute. Example: "false" verifies that the setting is disabled. This extension attribute requires this preference be set using Managed Preferences (MCX).
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh desiredValue="EditFromTemplate_Desired_Value_-_Example:_false" appDomain="com.apple.Safari" keyName="AutoFillMiscellaneousForms" currentUser=`last -1 -t console | awk '{print $1}'` result="" tmpResult="`dscl . mcxread /Users/$currentUser \"$appDomain\" \"$keyName\" |grep Value:| sed 's/Value\: //g'`" echo $tmpResult if [ "$tmpResult" == "1" ]; then result="true" else if [ "$tmpResult" == "0" ]; then result="false" else if [ "$tmpResult" == "" ]; then result="Domain or Key Not Found" else result="$tmpResult" fi fi fi if [ "$result" == "$desiredValue" ]; then echo "<result>Pass ($result)</result>" else echo "<result>Fail ($result)</result>" fi
